title: LF Dynamic queue and Ranked 5's possibly.
body:
Hi all,

The name is Syn, im 25 and im looking for some players to play ranked with. Im B5 (Due to decay) and yes, I know im bad, and I don't need you to tell me that :P. I welcome the chance to join a more experienced bunch of players and gain more knowledge from those better then myself. I don't rage, im not toxic and I most certainly do not troll and I hope you have the same values as myself :)

I main jungle and my off-role is mid.  I can also play all other roles comfortably.

I have Skype, Curse, TS and Discord, whichever you prefer to use and a working mic (Mics essential)

Id prefer it if you were 18+ as I swear like a sailor and my banter isn't for the young :P

Feel free to add me :)

Cheers,

Syn

replies.body: no such thing as decay in bronze but ok

I have several accounts, one is in high silver/low gold elo atm (Which is the account that is decaying and wlll likely be in bronze soon if I don't play on it soon), other one I play is in b5, too lazy to climb solo so im looking for people who actually want to climb lol

i can duo and play with my one of accounts, as that account fall to b1 last day lol but idm not my main, also this is also not my main. I am online in this account so add me in this one for now then I will tell you my other account once u add me
